Question
========

Given is the table for two dichotomous variables

  ----------- ----- ------- man woman glasses 13 32 no glasses 12 43 ----------- ----- -------

What is the ᵪ^2^ value of this data for the test of independence?

Answerlist
----------

* ᵪ2 = 0.070
* ᵪ2 = 0.660.
* ᵪ2 = 13.00.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* ᵪ2 = 0.070: Incorrect
* ᵪ2 = 0.660.: Correct
* ᵪ2 = 13.00.: Incorrect
